reviewText:
Not a DVD movie. Only 5 of the best podcast novels and short stories that you will ever hear: Earthcore, Ancestor, The Rookie, Nocturnal Episodes 1-5, and Bloodcast Season #1
Listen to Nocturnal 1 -5 and then go on over to [...] for the rest. You will not be dissapointed! MP3 format on a DVD ROM. Support the Future Dark Overlord!!!!! You have been warned..
50 hours of the best damn scifi action books your going to hear all read by the dark overlord himself!!

Do yourself a favor and order a bunch of these.(send them to your friends)  Over 50 hours of Horror/Scifi goodness.  I absolutely love these books and can't wait to hear more from Sigler.  I downloaded and packaged these myself last year and I can tell you that paying 6.08 for them is a steal.  I probably spent more than six bucks in supplies and time doing it myself.
